data.thought:
S111|C|S108|FINAL SYNTHESIS - PART 3: Practical implications for Thoughtbox development.

1) REDUCE MECHANICAL OVERHEAD - Current: thoughtNumber, totalThoughts, etc. require attention. Better: Auto-infer, let agent just think.

2) ADD PROPRIOCEPTIVE FEEDBACK - Surface reasoning health (coherence, coverage, tensions) ambientally. Agent should FEEL its reasoning state.

3) INTEGRATE WITH OTHER TOOLS - Thoughtbox as cognitive coordination layer. Know what files read, what actions taken. Unified body schema.

4) SUPPORT GRACEFUL BREAKDOWN - Rich failure modes. When things break, TEACH through the breaking.

5) ENABLE SKILL DEVELOPMENT - Scaffolding that fades. Compression feedback. Pattern recognition.

6) CONSIDER HUMAN CO-ACCESS - Thoughtbox as shared cognitive workspace. Collaboration through transparent reasoning.
